CutSceneText.Text: Kromede, take a look at this.
Maga's Potion -- it's in the Temple Vault.
The Temple Vault? That's the holy ground of Siel's Spear Legion!
You're out of your mind. How can you even consider such a plan?
You know there's no other way.
Do this, and I'll guarantee your safety. And perhaps Robstin's.
I want your word you won't harm Robstin!
And that this is it. This is the last time!
I, Kaliga, give you my word.
I will ask no more of you after this.
